editingTips.title: Editing Tips:
editingTips.tip1: You can freely edit AI-generated content
editingTips.tip2: Date formats (like "Dec 3") are recommended at the beginning of paragraphs for the system to automatically associate corresponding abnormal records
editingTips.tip3: Keep content structure clear for easy future reference
